channel.title: Softlayer_container_authentication_request_openidconnect_external_verisign on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_container_authentication_request_openidconnect_external_verisign on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_OpenIdConnect_External_Verisign
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_OpenIdConnect_External_Verisign Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_OpenIdConnect_External_Verisign data type contains information for requests to the getPortalLogin API. This class provides information to allow the user to submit a request to the SoftLayer OpenIdConnect (token) login service for a portal login token, as well as submitting a request to the Verisign 2 factor authentication service. Local openIdConnectAccessToken Type: string openIdConnectAccountId Type: integer openIdConnectProvider Type: string
